# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE - edit the master and reinstall.
# (/tmp/crontab.XXXXAiCFYe installed on Mon Mar 16 23:11:34 2020)
# (Cron version V5.0 -- $Id: crontab.c,v 1.12 2004/01/23 18:56:42 vixie Exp $)
MAILTO=""
*/1 * * * * csh -c "source ${HOME}/.cshrc; cd ${HOME}/tomcat/watchdog/bin && ${HOME}/tomcat/watchdog/bin/crontab_monitor.sh >& /dev/null"
*/1 * * * * csh -c "source ${HOME}/.cshrc; ${HOME}/tools/register/bin/startup-register.sh monitor >& /dev/null"
